Articles.Content:
Hello there.

I start moddeling few minutes ago and i think i learn fast...

But i need help with texturing and moddeling.I make it from three separate objects(is it bad?)but i need to "group" it together.

I'm using Blender 2.63(hmmmm i think now is 2.64).

There is what i need:

How to group it together

How to do a texture for it

How to apply texture on it

How to export it to unity

What to do after exporting it to unity

How to export it to KSP.

WIP Screenshot

Edited October 4, 2012 by EvilotionCR2

Highlight all three objects and hit Ctrl+J to join them as one Object.

That merges the objects, but the meshes will be will be unjoined (IE: you have duplicate edges and vertices where the parts join/overlap)

To solve that, you should align the overlapping edges as best you can, then to go EDIT MODE and hit A to "select all" then find the "Remove Doubles" function (either on the left side edit menu, or on the Edit mode bar under Mesh --> Vertices --> Remove Doubles

that should unify your meshes into one unit

Thanks Tiberion

PS:Your mods created "inspiration" to create mods.
